posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.81.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • The media gallery now includes two new tabs for audio messages and link previews. If a link falls in a group chat, does it make a sound?

Commit changes: Comparing v7.80.0-beta.3…v7.81.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

link_counts.title: Where is the published list of expired or unexpired versions

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.81.0-beta.1

43 new commits since 7.80.0-beta.3:

Show commits

  • v7.81.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Axo dialog design updates & aria checks [2]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7571] Fix duplicate word in bug report template [3]

  • Add byte length checks to poll question and options during create [4]

  • Simplify GumVideoCapturer [5]

  • Fix chat folder migration [6]

  • Don't clear link preview on text selection [7]

  • Fix findStoryMessage for in-memory messages [8]

  • Add ability for poll author to terminate a poll [9]

  • Implement backup support for chat folders [10]

  • Add pending poll vote UI state [11]

  • Update electron to 39.1.2 [12]

  • Init AxoIconButton [13]

  • Send and receive polls with latest protocol version [14]

  • Avoid orphaning quoted attachment thumbnails [15]

  • Poll notifications and read syncs [16]

  • Expire poll terminate chat events [17]

  • Fix scrollbars for all macOS settings [18]

  • Migrate react-contextmenu menus to axo menus [19]

  • Downgrade electron to 39.1.1 [20]

  • Update poll create placeholder text, fix test flake [21]

  • Update release notes [22]

  • Update strings [23]

  • Update DNS fallback [24]

  • Fix starting background color of about window [25]

  • Improve speed of getUnreadByConversationAndMarkRead query [26]

  • Highlight chat folder with open context menu [27]

  • Fix emoji picker closing when using pen/touch [28]

  • Fix loading screen theme [29]

  • FIx initial background of main window [30]

  • Link previews in all media [31]

  • Fix header menu keys [32]

  • Update electron to 39.2.0 [33]

  • Update electron to 39.2.1 [34]

  • Fix media gallery updates on message change [35]

  • Fix another instance of media gallery update [36]

  • Audio tab in media gallery [37]

  • Support consecutive playback in all media [38]

  • Polls UI Enhancements [39]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7526] Image disappears after first undo in media editor [40]

  • release notes [41]

  • Update strings [42]

  • 7.81.0-beta.1 [43]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.80.0-beta.3…v7.81.0-beta.1

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.80 release

posts.name: Jeffrey
posts.cooked:
yash-signal:

The media gallery now includes two new tabs for audio messages and link previews. If a link falls in a group chat, does it make a sound?

Wow. I like that in iOS and Android also. Congratulations to Desktop User.
Right-click to display context menu on a message seems to be broken.

posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked: @charadeyouare thanks for the report, can you send us your debug logs? Also, is there anything specific you see or does nothing appear?

Nothing appears upon right-clicking on a message link preview (not on the link itself). My bad.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.81.0-beta.1/4aace57c4bfa9c32bff7c1fcde046075cc3d2ed77a2fee1b948e40be6089388b.gz

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
Thanks for the new feature. But for me as mentioned before nothing appears in the ‘All Media’ section, under any tab whatsoever:

image742×618 5.24 KB

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.81.0-beta.1/6dee7947532233b3a5cf0f949e50360a40c23aa74addfda117dbf04b40dcb6e0.gz

posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked: Thank you for the updated log! We are still investigating

Links for which I have removed the preview don’t show up in the new tab for links. Sometimes, I intentionally send a link without the link preview and I’d still like to have those show up in this tab, too. Nonetheless, I love this feature and I hope it comes to Android as well.
(post deleted by author)

shaded:

Sometimes, I intentionally send a link without the link preview and I’d still like to have those show up in this tab, too.

Same here, except I nearly always remove the link preview. I prefer the condensed view of only having the link and not having a thumbnail image load. So it would be super if this function had all links show in the tab.

Ctrl-Shift-L doesn’t seem to open the menu anymore, on Linux.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.81.0-beta.1/0923dcffee833c93fc4a8b7b3f0bc515f0bda832079b7f020e0fa117d922b4c9.gz

It still worked just on 7.80, just confirmed.

If anyone else encounters the same problem, disable the registration lock, disable the PIN, and reinstall the app without a PIN. This will give you a “clean installation”. Then recreate the PIN and re-enable everything.

github.com/signalapp/Signal-Desktop

Desktop shows contacts not on phone, can't delete them because it thinks they are contacts on mobile device

opened 08:35AM - 06 Nov 23 UTC
TJ82
Bug

- [X] I have searched open and closed issues for duplicates - [X] I am using Si…gnal-Desktop as provided by the Signal team, not a 3rd-party package. ### Bug Description On Desktop I see contacts that aren't Signal contacts on my phone. They're also not blocked. When I attempt to delete these spurious contacts on Desktop I get told that that I need to delete them on my mobile device first. ### Steps to Reproduce - sync contacts 1. Go to settings, chats. 2. Hit "import now". #### Actual result: No changes in my contacts on Desktop, spurious contacts remain in place. #### Expected result: Same contacts on Desktop as on my phone, spurious contacts not on my phone gone from Desktop. ### Steps to Reproduce - contact deletion 1. Hit pencil icon to start new chat. 3. Locate the spurious contact. 4. Hit ... and then Remove. #### Actual Result: I get a message: > **Unable to remove [name]** > > This person is saved to your device’s Contacts. Delete them from your Contacts on your mobile device and try again. #### Expected Result: Deletion of the spurious contact. ### Screenshots N/A ### Platform Info Signal Version: 6.37.0. Operating System: Windows 10 Pro 22H2. Linked Device Version: Android, 6.38.2. ### Link to Debug Log Desktop: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/6.37.0/8965a82244edf0a867f159e03de9c728cd0bc6366fb0ca767814638544b01165.gz Android: https://debuglogs.org/android/6.38.2/771a4efd8e1bef45be1e35bd959888a731c92ee77d929f371760144c7e80a342

link_counts.title: Desktop shows contacts not on phone, can't delete them because it thinks they are contacts on mobile device · Issue #6660 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

posts.cooked: Worth noting this is nuclear, which means all group membership and contacts not saved outside of Signal will be lost.

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
Hitting enter fails to send the attachment (and there’s no visual button to do so):

image593×193 4.99 KB

So in effect the attachment is stuck and blocks the composition box.

Clicking on the pen sign also fails to open up the edit tool. So the only option is to discard the attachment.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.81.0-beta.1/d6d6fe76fffeea95776b2355b9c519d923823bfee708e55fcfb4f16be715fc17.gz

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked: are there any special properties to this attachment? because i remember encountering something similar in an unofficial flatpak whenever the attachment had non-ASCII characters in its name.

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked: Nothing special. I took a screenshot and pasted it as attachment.
